subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Josh McDaniels, the Patriots’ 32-year-old offensive coordinator, agreed to a four-year deal to replace Mike Shanahan, who was fired Dec. 30 after 14 seasons.
snippet: Josh McDaniels, the Patriots’ 32-year-old offensive coordinator, agreed to a four-year deal to replace Mike Shanahan, who was fired Dec. 30 after 14 seasons.
